Nexperia 1PS66SB82; 1PS88SB82
15 V, 30 mA low Cd Schottky barrier diodes

Product Summary.content: Nexperia 1PS66SB82; 1PS88SB82 are 15 V, 30 mA low Cd Schottky barrier diodes.
The Nexperia 1PS66SB82 and 1PS88SB82 are low capacitance Schottky barrier diodes designed for low forward voltage drop and fast switching applications.
These Schottky diodes from Nexperia have a reverse voltage rating of 15 V and a forward current rating of 30 mA, making them suitable for low power applications.
Key features of the Nexperia 1PS66SB82 and 1PS88SB82 include low forward voltage drop, low capacitance, and fast switching performance.

The Nexperia 1PS66SB82 and 1PS88SB82 are Schottky barrier diodes with a maximum reverse voltage of 15 V and a forward current rating of 30 mA, offering low capacitance and fast switching capabilities for various electronic applications.
